title: ObservationDefinition data model based on HL7 equivalent resource

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/' This is a ObservationDefinition resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Meta' The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/uri' String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/code' A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Narrative' A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/ResourceList' These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Extension' May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

category.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A code that classifies the general type of observation.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

code.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Identifier' A unique identifier assigned to this ObservationDefinition artifact.

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

permittedDataType.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/code' The data types allowed for the value element of the instance observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

items.description: A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents
Base definition for all elements in a resource.

_multipleResultsAllowed.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

method.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/CodeableConcept' A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

preferredReportName.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/string' A sequence of Unicode characters

_preferredReportName.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Element' Base definition for all elements in a resource.

quantitativeDetails.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/ObservationDefinition_QuantitativeDetails' Set of definitional characteristics for a kind of observation or measurement produced or consumed by an orderable health care service.

qualifiedInterval.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/ObservationDefinition_QualifiedInterval' Multiple  ranges of results qualified by different contexts for ordinal or continuous observations conforming to this ObservationDefinition.

items.description: Set of definitional characteristics for a kind of observation or measurement produced or consumed by an orderable health care service.

validCodedValueSet.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

normalCodedValueSet.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

abnormalCodedValueSet.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

criticalCodedValueSet.description: Property. Model:'https://github.com/agaldemas/incubated/raw/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/Reference' A reference from one resource to another.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'ObservationDefinition'
